Cannot set data in clipboard

The same (or rather a similar) error occurs sometimes when I press Ctrl-C in 
the Java editor (see stack trace below) with Eclipse 3.0M9 on Win XP.

The error occurs very rarely and non-reproduceably, but when it does, it 
remains 'active' until I close Eclipse.

From .log:

Comment #2 is not the same and is covered by bug 67313.

Markus, this bug sounds a lot like bug 65482 - but this bug should only happen 
on Motif and the Mac.  Are you sure this bug occurred on Windows XP?

I'm pretty sure it was on WinXP since I never worked on another machine around
that time. There's tiny possibility that it was on Win2000, but certainly no Mac
or *NIX.

I believe this is fixed by the fix for bug 65975.  Please retry with I20040617 
4PM or later.  If problem continues to occur, please reopen.
